document.full_text: investors pulled back some of their exposure to equities in april, buying bonds and turning to safe-haven cash amid worries that global economic growth could falter from its rapid pace, reuters polls showed on tuesday.
document.title: investors move back into cash in april: reuters poll
lines_and_colors: investors pulled back some of their exposure to equities in april, buying bonds and turning to safe-haven cash amid worries that global economic growth could falter from its rapid pace, reuters polls showed on tuesday.
